## 2Q PGconf 2018 in Chicago: Dec 4th-5th


2Q PGconf is looking for dynamic presentations, case studies, and technical talks on PostgreSQL. To submit a talk, please visit:

**[http://www.2qpgconf.com/#cfp](http://www.2qpgconf.com/#cfp)**

Submission deadline is **Sep 12, 2018** midnight Pacific Time.
